plot: John Oliver discusses homeschooling, its surprising lack of regulation in many states, and, crucially, Darth Vader's parenting skills.

John Oliver explains how 'Homeschooling' is running in United States America. First he points out why it is necessary and how helpful it is for so many parents and children. Then he brings the case that what little or no monitoring it has and how it is affecting the safety of the children and their leaning. He also inform viewers about the lobby effort of the National Home School Association to keep it unregulated which in many cases help the abusive parents to continue child abuse.—Niaz Islam Arif
